channel.title: Release Notes - 2023 on Releases - aspose.com
channel.description: Recent content in Release Notes - 2023 on Releases - aspose.com

item.title: Aspose.HTML for Java 23.12 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.HTML for Java 23.12 We are honored to announce the December release of Aspose.HTML for.Java. In this release, we have improved the rendering stability.

item.title: Aspose.HTML for Java 23.11 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.HTML for Java 23.11 We are honored to announce the November release of Aspose.HTML for.Java. In this release, we have improved the quality of rendering and resulting documents. Improved stability loading and processing resources to avoid freezing.

item.title: Aspose.HTML for Java 23.10 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.HTML for Java 23.10 We are honored to announce the October release of Aspose.HTML for.Java. In this release, the functionality for working with a default screen resolution is 1024x768 when the device has a multiscreen. Also, this release supports JDK 8, JDK 11 LTS, and JDK 17 LTS.

item.title: Aspose.HTML for Java 23.8 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.HTML for Java 23.8 We are honored to announce the Augusteber release of Aspose.HTML for.Java. In this release, the functionality for working with MD format has been added. Public API and Backward Incompatible Changes Added APIs The functionality for working with MD format has located in the Aspose.Html.Toolkit.Markdown namespace.

item.title: Aspose.HTML for Java 23.5.1 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.HTML for Java 23.5.1 As per the regular monthly update process of all APIs being offered by Aspose, we are honored to announce the May release of Aspose.HTML for Java. In this release, we added fixing the feature convert HTML to Text. Public API and Backward Incompatible Changes Enhancement APIs The following classes have been enhancement: com.aspose.html.converters.Converter void convertHTML(Url url, TextSaveOptions options, String outputPath) void convertHTML(String sourcePath, TextSaveOptions options, String outputPath) void convertHTML(HTMLDocument document, TextSaveOptions options, String outputPath) void convertHTML(String content, String baseUri, TextSaveOptions options, String outputPath) void convertHTML(Url url, Configuration configuration, TextSaveOptions options, String outputPath) void convertHTML(String sourcePath, Configuration configuration, TextSaveOptions options, String outputPath) void convertHTML(String content, String baseUri, Configuration configuration, TextSaveOptions options, String outputPath) com.

item.title: Aspose.HTML for Java 23.5 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.HTML for Java 23.5 As per the regular monthly update process of all APIs being offered by Aspose, we are honored to announce the May release of Aspose.HTML for Java. In this release, we continued to adapt the API to Java native classes. Public API and Backward Incompatible Changes Enhancement APIs The following classes have been relocated and added: com.aspose.html.IDisposable com.aspose.html.NotImplementedException com.aspose.html.utils.DateTime com.

item.title: Aspose.HTML for Java 23.4 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.HTML for Java 23.4 We are honored to announce the April release of Aspose.HTML for Java. In this release, we have adapted the API to Java native classes. Public API and Backward Incompatible Changes Enhancement APIs class com.aspose.html.rendering.MhtmlRenderer void render(IDevice device, InputStream inputStream, Configuration configuration) void render(IDevice device, IGenericList<Stream> documents, Configuration configuration, TimeSpan timeout) class com.aspose.html.rendering.HtmlRenderer void render(IDevice device, long timeout, Document document) void render(IDevice device, String timeout, Document document) void render(IDevice device, String timeout, Document[] documents) class com.

item.title: Aspose.HTML for Java 23.1 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.HTML for Java 23.1 We are honored to announce the January release of Aspose.HTML for Java. In this release, we made a big update to the CSS engine.
